directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Place bacon in a skillet and cook over medium heat until the pieces are browned.
Remove with a slotted spoon to paper towels.
Discard all but 1 tablespoon of bacon grease.
Stir in onions and mushrooms, and cook until soft.
In a large bowl, stir together beef, egg, and milk.
Stir in the onion and mushrooms.
Mix in about 4 ounces of Swiss cheese, and all but 1 tablespoon of bacon.
Stir in cornflake crumbs, and mix until well blended.
Shape into a loaf, and place in a meatloaf pan.
Bake in a preheated oven for 1 hour.
Drain fat, and sprinkle with remaining cheese and bacon.
Return to oven, and bake until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.
